original_title: Nicht alles was fliegt, ist ein Vogel
overview: Franz and Martha settle down in an abandoned house. For Franz, it means an end to their continual moving around and it also means that he will sleep in a good bed. But Martha thinks otherwise, because she knows that she will be awaken constantly by Franz who will tell her his strange nightmares.
title: Nicht alles was fliegt, ist ein Vogel
